optionalAttribute

public static <T> void optionalAttribute(XmlSerializer serializer,
                                         String namespaceURI,
                                         String localName,
                                         T value,
                                         T defaultValue)
                              throws IOException
Serializes an optional attribute. Nothing is going to be written if both value and defaultValue are null.

Type Parameters:
T - value type parameter
Parameters:
serializer - serializer.
namespaceURI - XML namespace name
localName - XML local name
value - attribute value; can be null
defaultValue - default value going to be written when the value is null; can be null
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

simpleTag

public static void simpleTag(XmlSerializer serializer,
                             String namespaceURI,
                             String localName,
                             Object text,
                             boolean nillable)
                      throws IOException
Serializes a tag. A NullPointerException will be thrown if nillable is false and text is null.

Parameters:

localName - XML local name
